description: Allows the user to create and manipulate wax at will. The wax can be molded into various shapes and is extremely hard when solidified, stronger than steel. The user can also secrete wax from their body.

users.circumstances: Mr. 3 (Galdino) is the known user of this fruit

abilityReveals.description: Mr. 3's giant wax structure that traps Zoro, Nami, Vivi, and Brogy. The structure is designed to slowly encase them in wax, turning them into statues.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to trap the Straw Hats and Brogy, nearly killing them before Luffy uses fire to destroy it.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Hardened wax is stronger than steel
strengths.description: The wax can be hardened to extreme durability, making it effective for both offense and defense.
Can create complex structures like buildings, weapons, and traps.

description: Allows the user's body to produce explosions from any part of their body, including their breath. The user is immune to explosions.

users.circumstances: Mr. 5 (Gem) is the known user of this fruit

abilityReveals.description: Mr. 5 uses his explosive abilities to severely injure Usopp during their battle, demonstrating the fruit's offensive power.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used against Usopp during the counterattack, though Usopp endures the attacks to complete his plan.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: User cannot be harmed by explosions, whether their own or from external sources.

description: Allows the user to change their body weight at will, from 1 kilogram to 10,000 kilograms. The user can become extremely light to float or extremely heavy to crush opponents.

users.circumstances: Miss Valentine (Mikita) is the known user of this fruit

abilityReveals.description: Miss Valentine uses her weight-changing abilities to attempt to crush the trapped crew members and fight against Nami and Vivi.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used against the Straw Hats during the battle, before being defeated by Nami and Vivi working together.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Extreme weight variation for offense and mobility
strengths.description: Can become light enough to float or heavy enough to crush opponents.
